name: USA TODAY
description: USA Today is a national American daily newspaper competing with with The Wall Street Journal and The New York Times for the position of having the widest circulation of any newspaper in the United States. The USA Today API provides access to articles from its paper, as well as other valuable book, music, and other media related content. The USA Today API is free to use, with it driving traffic and brand awareness for the newspaper.

apis.name: USA Today Articles
apis.description: USA Today is a national American daily newspaper competing with with The Wall Street Journal and The New York Times for the position of having the widest circulation of any newspaper in the United States. The USA Today API provides access to articles from its paper, as well as other valuable book, music, and other media related content. The USA Today API is free to use, with it driving traffic and brand awareness for the newspaper.

apis.name: USA Today Best-Selling Books
apis.description: The USA TODAY Best-Selling Books API provides a method for retrieving the weekly list of the nation’s top-selling books as compiled by USA TODAY and published each Thursday. In addition, the API can be used to access a title's history on the list and metadata about each title. All bestseller information is available in a custom handler. Please refer to our documentation below which describes in detail how data can be requested and returned. We welcome your feedback, so please contribute to our forum or contact us at api@usatoday.com.

The USA Today API provides access to articles from its paper, as well as other valuable book, music, and other media related content. apis.name: USA Today Breaking News
apis.description: USA Today is a national American daily newspaper competing with with The Wall Street Journal and The New York Times for the position of having the widest circulation of any newspaper in the United States. The USA Today API provides access to articles from its paper, as well as other valuable book, music, and other media related content. apis.name: USA Today Census
apis.description: The USA TODAY Census API allows developers to programmatically access United States Census information. Data concerning ethnicity, housing, population and race is available from both the 2000 and 2010 census, as well as basic population numbers dating back to the original 1790 census. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are formatted in JSON.

apis.name: USA Today Movie Reviews
apis.description: The USA TODAY Movie Reviews API provides a method for retrieving USA TODAY movie review content. In addition to the textual content of a review, the API returns various types of metadata associated with each title. All reviews information is available in a JSON handler. Please refer to our documentation below which describes in detail how data can be requested and returned. We welcome your feedback, so please contribute to our forum or contact us at api@usatoday.com.

apis.name: USA Today Music Reviews
apis.description: The USA TODAY Music Reviews API provides a method for retrieving USA TODAY music review content. In addition to the textual content of a review, the API returns various types of metadata associated with each title. All reviews information is available in a JSON handler. Please refer to our documentation below which describes in detail how data can be requested and returned. We welcome your feedback, so please contribute to our forum or contact us at api@usatoday.com.

apis.name: USA Today Snapshots
apis.description: Using the USA TODAY Snapshots API, developers will be able to construct their own custom feeds for USA TODAY Snapshots. Snapshots are easy-to-read statistical graphics that present information on various issues and trends in a visually appealing way, posted online every day Monday through Friday. Snapshots data is available in a custom handler. Please refer to our documentation below which describes in detail how data can be requested and returned. We welcome your feedback, so please contribute to our forum or contact us at api@usatoday.com.

apis.name: USA Today Sports Salaries
apis.description: The USA TODAY Salaries API allows developers to programmatically access the USA TODAY Sports Salaries database. Extensive information for the MLB, NFL, NBA and NHL is available for multiple seasons, including player, position and team data. All salaries information is available in a custom handler. Please refer to our documentation below which describes in detail how data can be requested and returned. We welcome your feedback, so please contribute to our forum or contact us at api@usatoday.com.
